controller

Class FacadeControllerServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.FacadeControllerServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InterfaceServer

    public class FacadeControllerServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements InterfaceServer
    Provides a simplified interface to the methods the customers need.
